name: udemy-prompt-engineering-course (BrightPool)
description: [项目级] Content for the Udemy Prompt Engineering Course。来源: https://github.com/BrightPool/udemy-prompt-engineering-course

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Content for the Udemy Prompt Engineering Course

来源: https://github.com/BrightPool/udemy-prompt-engineering-course
语言: Jupyter Notebook
Stars: 561

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
- Install gitleaks for secret scanning: `brew install gitleaks`
- Install pre-commit: `pip install pre-commit`
- Install pre-commit hooks: `pre-commit install`

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
README.md
advanced_image_model_techniques
advanced_image_model_techniques/advanced_consistent_characters.ipynb
advanced_image_model_techniques/advanced_inpainting_with_flux.ipynb
advanced_image_model_techniques/advanced_outpainting_with_flux.ipynb
advanced_image_model_techniques/async_text_to_image_with_flux.ipynb
advanced_image_model_techniques/control_net.ipynb
advanced_image_model_techniques/draw_image_mask_with_gradio.ipynb
advanced_image_model_techniques/fine_tuning_with_flux_lora.ipynb
advanced_image_model_techniques/image_editing_with_flux_kontext.ipynb
advanced_image_model_techniques/image_to_image_with_flux.ipynb
advanced_image_model_techniques/image_upscaling_with_clarity.ipynb
advanced_image_model_techniques/rhino-mask.png
advanced_image_model_techniques/rhino-suit.png
advanced_image_model_techniques/segment_anything_inpainting.ipynb
advanced_image_model_techniques/text_to_image_with_flux.ipynb
advanced_image_model_techniques/xyz_prompt_grids.ipynb
advanced_text_model_techniques
advanced_text_model_techniques/ReAct_implementation.ipynb
advanced_text_model_techniques/personas.ipynb

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content: `gitleaks detect --source="." --report-path="gitleaks-report.json"`
